name: Sikait
description:
Sikait is an individual third-person game where you can control time, investigate Ancient Egypt and slay the monsters of the desert and the Gods that disturb the peace of the world.

Gods created the world four thousand years ago. Khepri, the god Sun, maintained the peace and protected that world thanks to the Sun. Later, Khepri had to left humanity to create more worlds with his brothers, so he created a magic bracelet that contains an extension of his power in order to make the Sun mot falling into darkness.
